location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Sir Henry Willock, British Envoy to Persia, to James Dow, In Charge of the Bushire Residency

mods.abstract: In the letter Willock encloses under flying seal correspondence to the Honourable Governor of Bombay, dated 4 July 1820. Willock also encloses a packet for Captain Thompson, currently based at Rasel Khyma [Ra's al-Khaymah], which he requests Bruce forward at the earliest opportunity.
